profiles.i18n_desc: A Utility for Linux to control many aspects of various ASUS laptops but can also be used with non-asus laptops with reduced features.
profiles.i18n_desc[en_US]: A Utility for Linux to control many aspects of various ASUS laptops but can also be used with non-asus laptops with reduced features.
profiles.check_script: dpkg-query -W -f='${Status}'rog-control-center 2>/dev/null | grep "install ok installed" && dpkg-query -W -f='${Status}' xpad-noone-dkms 2>/dev/null | grep "install ok installed" && dpkg-query -W -f='${Status}' xone-dkms 2>/dev/null | grep "install ok installed"
